name: Demon Dater
description:
Bio:

Seduce the demons!!

Struggle to survive and have some action on the side! Can you beat the rare "Date Bosses"??

Controls:

Use the left mouse button to click through dialogue and select answers.

Press M to mute and unmute audio.

Hints:

You won't always have a good answer available! Sometimes you'll be too flustered with emotions to say the right thing.

The pink (heart) meter indicates how well the date is going; the fuller the better.

The purple (dice) meter indicates how close you are to a "Dice Round". A dice round will pick an answer at random, so make sure you have enough date points to  sacrifice! 

The dice meter will charge each time you select a good answer!

Credit:

Art by Izzy + Sam.

Music by Louis.

Programming by Milan + Sam.
